attributes.action: Help employers to provide extra paid leave for parents during school closures.
attributes.additional_details:
1) So that the mental, emotional and educational wellbeing of working parents and their children is protected. 
2) So that businesses are protected
3) So that gender equality is not set fruther back by the pandemic
attributes.background: The Government should make funds available to employers so that working parents can be given additional leave to provide home learning while schools are closed.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559231
